content.question: Which of the following arguments could best be supported by the purpose of the excerpt?

choices.label: Urbanization led to the transformation of the natural landscape in every part of the country.
Industrialization resulted in the use of fewer raw materials because of efficient production.
Reformers encouraged the more active protection of natural resources.
Wartime mobilization contributed to the use of national parks for military purposes.

content.answer: Reformers encouraged the more active protection of natural resources.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
